markdownRemark.html: This club in Algeciras has magnificent facilities in a friendly family atmosphere. The club has 5 tennis courts - 4 green-set and 1 artificial turf, 2 padel courts of artificial turf and a lounge area.

frontmatter.title: Algeciras Club de Tenis
